about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Acknowledged worldwide for the quality, accuracy and capability of component measurement products

prestigious.title: Prestigious
prestigious.description: Founded in 1946 in London, UK, Wayne Kerr Electronics has become the world's leading manufacturer of electronic test equipment over the past 78 years.

professional.title: Professional
professional.description: Specialized in providing the high accuracy, quality, and capabilities in component testing equipment (LCR Meter, Impedance Analyzer, High Frequency LCR Meter)

worldwide.title: Worldwide
worldwide.description: Wayne Kerr Electronics has established regional offices in U.S.A, Germany, Singapore, India, Japan, China, and Taiwan for worldwide technical supports and services

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to revolutionize the field of component measurement through innovation, quality, and commitment. We aim to empower industries worldwide with precision tools that enhance efficiency and reliability.
values: Empowering industries with precision measurement solutions

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We pioneer advanced measurement technologies that set new industry standards for accuracy and reliability.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: Our dedication to customer success drives us to deliver great service and support, ensuring satisfaction and trust.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Every product we offer is a testament to our commitment to quality, designed for durability and performance.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: 78 years of innovation and excellence in precision measurement

1946.title: Foundation in London
1946.description: Wayne Kerr Electronics was established in London, UK, beginning our journey in precision measurement.

1960s.title: Industry Recognition
1960s.description: Gained worldwide recognition for quality and accuracy in component measurement products.

1980s.title: Global Expansion
1980s.description: Established regional offices across continents to provide worldwide technical support.

2000s.title: Technology Leadership
2000s.description: Became the world's leading manufacturer of electronic test equipment and LCR meters.

today.title: 78+ Years of Excellence
today.description: Continuing to innovate and serve customers across 57 countries with precision solutions.
